{{about|the list of families|the target selector argument <code>family</code>|Target selectors#Selecting targets by family}}
{{exclusive|bedrock}}

A '''family''', or '''entity family''', is a unique technical label for {{el|be}}, which specifies the family to which an [[entity]] belongs. Families are defined by the [https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/minecraft/creator/reference/content/entityreference/examples/entitycomponents/minecraftcomponent_type_family <code>minecraft:type_family</code>] component in the entities' behavior files. These labels are used for target selection in [[Target_selectors#Selecting_targets_by_family|commands]] and entity behaviors. <!-- Do not link the [[Target selector]] page to the term ‘target selection,’ because that page only covers usage in commands. -->
